body_content.explanation: a boxer who is in the heaviest weight group, or this division of boxing weight:
examples: He was short for a heavyweight and had only a short reach.
Mike Tyson was heavyweight champion of the world.
Ali defeated Sonny Liston in 1964 for the world heavyweight title.
He has held world titles at light heavyweight and, briefly, at heavyweight.

body_content.explanation: a person or thing that is important or serious and that other people notice:
examples: Her extraordinary intelligence and speaking ability made her a political heavyweight.
